abstract: Sarah Maslin Nir Nocturnalist column observes that amid overnight activity at Zuccotti Park, weary Occupy Wall Street protesters seek rest beneath tarpaulins or wherever they can.
snippet: Amid the activity overnight at Zuccotti Park, weary protesters seek rest beneath tarpaulins or wherever they can.
lead_paragraph: Amid the activity overnight at Zuccotti Park, weary protesters seek rest beneath tarpaulins or wherever they can.

headline.main: At Protest Central, Sleep, if You Can
headline.print_headline: At Protest Central, Sleep, if You Can
headline.seo: Overnight at Zuccotti Park, Protesters Seek Sleep
